ai-patthana15.43:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.43:1.1_0: mind no cause or reasons to give rise to thoughts. ...
ai-patthana15.43:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.43:2.1_0: mind no cause or reasons to give rise to thoughts. ...
ai-patthana15.43:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.43:2.1_3: What is an unshakable, in the three ways?
